name: Impossible Snake Rush- Endless Maze Runner Arcade
name_original: Impossible Snake Rush- Endless Maze Runner Arcade
description:
Impossible Snake Rush is an endless arcade maze runner. Guide your snake through the maze, collect gems, unlock characters but, do not hit the walls!

Smash and collect gems to unlock cool new snake arrow heads! There are 9 to unlock.

One touch game play with endless boundaries that will keep you entertained for hours!

Game Features:
• Endless maze runner, winding style gameplay;
• One game mode to test your wit and concentration;
• Unlock all 9 characters as you collect more gems:
• Simple yet stunning graphics and game play;
• No one game is the same; and
• Game Center integration (with leaderboards and achievements) so you can play with your friends!

Challenge yourself with this snake-tastic, winding, endless runner game!
